thought: The Slack action parameters are currently empty, which causes the workflow execution error. I need to provide the required parameters for sending a text message to the #general channel with the message text extracted from input data.
plan: Set select to 'channel' to send to a Slack channel.
Set channelId mode to 'name' and value to 'general' to specify the #general channel.
Set messageType to 'text' for simple text messages.
Set text parameter to '={{$json["text"]}}' to extract the text from input data.
Test the Slack action to ensure messages are sent successfully.
criticism: Without proper parameters, the Slack action cannot execute. This is a critical missing step for the workflow to function correctly.

tool_input.comments: Send classification results to Slack channel #general with message text extracted from input data.
